tabledefinitions.profile: CREATE TABLE `profile` (`profilename` varchar(45) NOT NULL , `risk` varchar(45) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`profilename`))
tabledefinitions.ticker: CREATE TABLE `ticker` (`symbol` varchar(45) NOT NULL , `target` decimal NOT NULL ,`exchange` varchar(45) NOT NULL ,`profilename` varchar(45) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`symbol`, `exchange`, `profilename`), KEY `fkIdx_27` (`profilename`), CONSTRAINT `FK_27` FOREIGN KEY `fkIdx_27` (`profilename`) REFERENCES `profile` (`profilename`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE RESTRICT)
tabledefinitions.user: CREATE TABLE `user` (`username` varchar(45) NOT NULL , `firstname` varchar(45) NOT NULL ,`lastname` varchar(45) NOT NULL ,`salt` varchar(45) NOT NULL ,`hash` varchar(256) NOT NULL ,`email` varchar(45) NOT NULL ,`status` varchar(45) NOT NULL ,`type` varchar(45) NOT NULL ,`creationdate` datetime NOT NULL ,PRIMARY KEY (`username`))
tabledefinitions.account: CREATE TABLE `account`(`accountid`    integer NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `username`     varchar(45) NOT NULL , `nickname`     varchar(45) NOT NULL ,`creationdate` datetime NOT NULL ,PRIMARY KEY (`accountid`),KEY `fkIdx_71` (`username`),CONSTRAINT `FK_71` FOREIGN KEY `fkIdx_71` (`username`) REFERENCES `user` (`username`))
tabledefinitions.accountrecord: CREATE TABLE `accountrecord`(`symbol` varchar(45) NOT NULL , `exchange` varchar(45) NOT NULL , `accountid`   integer NOT NULL , `profilename` varchar(45) NOT NULL , `units`       float NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`symbol`, `exchange`, `accountid`, `profilename`),KEY `fkIdx_36` (`profilename`), CONSTRAINT `FK_36` FOREIGN KEY `fkIdx_36` (`profilename`) REFERENCES `profile` (`profilename`), KEY `fkIdx_43` (`symbol`, `exchange`, `profilename`), CONSTRAINT `FK_43` FOREIGN KEY `fkIdx_43` (`symbol`, `exchange`, `profilename`) REFERENCES `ticker` (`symbol`, `exchange`, `profilename`), KEY `fkIdx_90` (`accountid`), CONSTRAINT `FK_90` FOREIGN KEY `fkIdx_90` (`accountid`) REFERENCES `account` (`accountid`))
tabledefinitions.transactionlog: CREATE TABLE `transactionlog`( `transactionid` varchar(45) NOT NULL UNIQUE , `date` datetime NOT NULL , `type` varchar(45) NOT NULL , `description`   multilinestring NOT NULL , `accountbefore` json NOT NULL , `accountafter`  json NOT NULL , `accountId` integer NOT NULL ,PRIMARY KEY (`transactionid`),KEY `fkIdx_79` (`accountId`),CONSTRAINT `FK_79` FOREIGN KEY `fkIdx_79` (`accountId`) REFERENCES `account` (`accountId`))
